snippet: It is almost a truism that presidential second terms are less successful than first terms, especially domestically.
abstract: Pres Barack Obama, having won re-election, faces the prospect of a challenge with deep roots in political history--what historians and commentators call the 'second-term curse'.
lead_paragraph: It is almost a truism that presidential second terms are less successful than first terms, especially domestically.

headline.seo: Triumphant Obama Faces New Foe in ‘Second-Term Curse’
headline.main: Triumphant Obama Faces New Foe in ‘Second-Term Curse’
headline.print_headline: Triumphant Obama Faces New Foe in ‘Second-Term Curse’
